item.title: OMNICOM GROUP INC 10-K
item.description: OMNICOM GROUP INC, which is in the Services-Advertising Agencies [7311] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 08, 2023 had 26848 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 1 - 284 instances million - 268 instances revenue - 264 instances 2022 - 246 instances financial - 234 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
